mission.title: Mission
mission.p1: CE Notes was created to collect and organize fundamental topics in computer engineering and related disciplines in a single, coherent place.
mission.p2: The goal is not speed or shortcuts, but building solid foundations through well-structured explanations and rigorous reasoning.
